title: Calories in 3 oz Chicken Breast
meta_description: Discover calories in 3 oz chicken breast, including protein, fat, carbs, per-oz basis, and simple tweaks for your meal planning.
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no sauce/oil added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cut, cooking method, seasoning, water content, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 3 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast has ~141 kcal and ~26 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-oz basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per oz
Breaded and fried (vs. grilled) per oz

faqs.q: How many calories in 3 oz cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: About 141 kcal for skinless, boneless, cooked without added fats.

faqs.q: How much protein in 3 oz chicken breast?
Are these values for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight. Raw 3 oz cooks down to about 2.25 oz due to moisture loss.

faqs.q: What affects calories in chicken breast most?
faqs.a: Skin, added oils, breading, or sauces can increase calories significantly.

faqs.q: Calories per oz of chicken breast?
faqs.a: Roughly 47 kcal per 1 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast.
